sentences.english: He built up the city around it, from the supporting terraces to the surrounding wall, while Joab restored the rest of the city.
sentences.chinese: 大衛又從米羅起，四圍建築城牆，其餘的是約押修理。

sentences.english: Mirroni hypnotizes himself to cure his body and soul.
sentences.chinese: 米羅尼催眠自己以治療他的體與心。

sentences.english: She won the gold ahead of Miroshina by a margin of more than 50 points.
sentences.chinese: 她以比米羅申娜領先50多分的成績摘得了金牌。

sentences.english: And David built round about from Millo and inward.
sentences.chinese: 大衛又從米羅以裏，周圍築牆。

sentences.english: Mironov did not attend the day's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 米羅諾夫沒有出席當天的會議。

sentences.english: José has fired at an intruder, who turns out to be Escamillo.
sentences.chinese: 賀塞向侵入者開槍，結果發現來者是艾斯卡米羅。

sentences.english: Schutt added: "Miro would like to play abroad at some time."
sentences.chinese: 米羅或許會想到國外踢球，但可能要等到兩年之後。

sentences.english: Oscar Ramiro, an auto mechanic from Vera Cruz, says times are hard.
sentences.chinese: 拉米羅是一位來自墨西哥維拉克魯斯的汽車修理工。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Arnold (name)/refers to Arnold Schwarzenegger 阿諾·施瓦辛格|阿诺·施瓦辛格[A1 nuo4 · Shi1 wa3 xin1 ge2]
Taiwan equivalent of 莫奈[Mo4 nai4]
